seo.title: 7-dniowy plan po Wybrzeżu Amalfitańskim bez samochodu
seo.description: Tydzień na wybrzeżu: baza w Positano i Amalfi, nocleg na Capri/Sorrento oraz elastyczne pomysły na dzień.

linkLabel: 7-dniowy plan po Wybrzeżu Amalfitańskim bez samochodu

sections.title: Day 3 — Capri loop
body: Keep a bus ticket stash ready in case ferries halt; Sorrento back-up routes take around 90 minutes door to door.

sections.title: Days 6–7 — culture & buffer
body: Keep the last day as a buffer for weather or pure leisure—repeat a favourite beach or wander artisan shops.

tips: Laundry mid-week keeps bags light; use self-service machines near Chiesa Nuova.
Track ferry updates on operator Instagram accounts during windy spells.
